flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=15>>15 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 15*300=$<<15*300=4500>>4500
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=205>>205 profit
So those added 205*2=$<<205*2=410>>410
So his total profit from everything was 4500+410+2000=$<<4500+410+2000=6910>>6910
So he made a profit of 6910-4000=$<<6910-4000=2910>>2910
#### 2910

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 205. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
